thread.title: Airbnb: Mariah Carey, Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Blunt houses up for rent | Life and Lifestyle | Lifestyle and Living |
thread.title_full: Airbnb: Mariah Carey, Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Blunt houses up for rent | Life and Lifestyle | Lifestyle and Living | | The Courier-Mail

author: couriermail.com.au
title: Airbnb: Mariah Carey, Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Blunt houses up for rent | Life and Lifestyle | Lifestyle and Living |
text:
Actors Emily Blunt and John Krasinski have recently moved out of their 279 sq m Los Angeles pad and are renting it out through Airbnb , for $AU880 a night.
The single-storey house has six bedroom, three bathrooms, a patio, jacuzzi and parking for up to ten cars.
It’s gated with a private driveway and features dark hardwood floors, art deco chandeliers, antique furniture and Waterworks bathrooms.
Guests even receive brand new bedding, linen, towels and a hairdryer in each bedroom.
Dozens of Airbnb reviewers have given the property five stars.
“The property is in a great location with excellent views,” wrote one user. Another said, “This home is very private and impeccably designed. The linen, bathrobes and toiletries were all beautiful.”
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Here are four other former celebrity homes you can rent out on Airbnb. Holidays, anyone?
MARIAH CAREY
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Got a spare $14,681? You can afford to rent Mariah’s spectacular 3,764sq ft beachfront pad in Carbon Beach, Malibu for a night.
This four bedroom, four bathroom “romantic Mediterranean villa” is owned by movie producer Michael Lambert and is located right on the sand. There’s a large bar, an indoor/outdoor spa jacuzzi, a media room and a guest cottage.
Imagine blasting Heartbreaker on that deck during a summer afternoon, with a glass of sparkling in hand. HEAVEN.
Photo: Airbnb Source: Supplied
LEONARDO DI CAPRIO
The heated pool. Photo: 432 Hermosa. Source: Supplied
Leo gives Jordan ‘Wolf of Wall Street’ Belfort a run for his money with this “secluded 1.3-acre desert oasis compound” in Palm Springs. It’ll cost you $AU6470 per night.
There are six bedrooms and 7.5 bathrooms in the main house. There is a guesthouse overlooking the pool (Ryan Atwood, anyone?) and a casita adjacent to the tennis court.
An aerial view of the property. Photo: 432 Hermosa. Source: Supplied
Leo’s home boasts a deluxe chef’s kitchen, multiple fireplaces, a gated service entrance, daily maid service and a cocktail bar. Perfect for entertaining supermodels.
The property is located within Old Las Palmas, Palm Springs’ most sought-after neighbourhood. Celebs including Frank Sinatra, Marilyn Monroe, Elizabeth Taylor, Cary Grant, Dean Martin, Liberace and Elvis Presley used to holiday here.
JULIE ANDREWS
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Dubbed the Rubber House, this unusual property in Accord, New York is a little more attainable price wise. The two bedroom, two bathroom house will set you back $734 a night .
It was designed by architect Tom Pritchard and was then owned by the Mary Poppins actor, who retained the property’s original dance studio and industrial kitchen, while upgrading the master bathroom with a two-person bath tub overlooking the woods. The master also has a fireplace and curved glass floor-to-ceiling windows and a wooden deck.
One Airbnb reviewer called his experience at the Rubber House a “mindblowingly pleasant stay”. Sign me up.
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
DENZEL WASHINGTON
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Continuing the theme of massive, secluded houses, Mr Washington’s former home is a gated property on eight acres.
It sits on a 300ft high bluff overlooking Malibu beach, with 180 degree ocean views.
For $719 a night you get three bedroom, two bathrooms, a detached gym and an oversized outdoor patio where you can watch dolphins play and whales migrate.
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Those lucky enough to stay in the master bedroom can fall asleep and wake up to the sound of waves crashing against the Californian shore.
The pad is also the former home of Led Zeppelin’s Jimmy Page and Hollywood star Jan Michael Vincent.
Photo: Airbnb. Source: Supplied
Originally published as ‘5 amazing celeb homes you could holiday in’
